keywords: ['animal noises', 'wolves howling', 'sound of birds flying away', 'horror theme', 'werewolf sounds', 'sounds in the forest']
caption: This clip features animal noises in the forest. The noises are those of wolves or werewolves howling. It sounds like birds are scattering away as soon as the howling noises are heard. There are no musical instruments in this clip.
